website_summaries.verdict: It's soft and safe, and if you don't mind having a heated mattress pad that doesn't warm up the whole bed, it's a decent choice.
pros: An appealing choice for any safety-conscious consumer thanks to low-voltage technology that promotes safety without compromising performance
cons: Unlike many heated mattress pads, this one is only warm where the person is lying on it

customer_reviews.title: To be avoided!
customer_reviews.text: the original ordered product stopped working properly within a few months. unwisely, I asked for a replacement and sent back the original. The replacement lasted 5 months and is now not working properly. Poor product. Would not recommend. I had another brand that lasted nearly 10 years before it quit. I am very disappointed as I thought Serta was a reputable name and this was not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Nottoli

customer_reviews.title: NOT SERTA!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is being falsely advertised as a Serta! It works fine and feels soft but they are lying about the brand. It shows a Serta label in the pics but it shows up with the label I have attached a picture of showing it is made by "Perfect Fit Industries" and "SoftHeat Industries" which is sold on here and other places for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cover is nice, soft
customer_reviews.text: The main reason we bought this mattress cover was to keep the bed warm on on cold nights. No more getting into a cold bed at night! Maybe we're spoiled... but we expected it to work for more than 5 months! The heat shuts down on one side, while the other one stays on. The cover is nice, soft, and fits well... but it doesn't heat any more! Too late to return... what a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Trust all the reviews that say this stops working.
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to give this product one star. It seems like it could be nice. But approximately one month after getting it, one side doesn't work. It would just turn itself off a couple of minutes after I turned it on without ever warming. When I unplugged it, the wires just came out. I tried to put them back in, but it just does the same thing. The indicator comes on for a couple of minutes maybe, then it just turns off, without ever warming. I'd read this happened to some people in the reviews. I was hoping this wouldn't be the case with mine, but it certainly was. I gambled and I lost.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Shanley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my wife, she has chronic back issues and uses a small heating pad every night to get a little relief. Thought this would be a good item for her, but it just doesn't get warm enough. If you live in a cold climate would probably be fine for warming the bed just before you get in, but definitely not warm enough to ease aching backs or muscles. Other than that it appears to be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rev MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year, and it was just what I was looking for. I had it stored away in it's original packing during the warmer months, and just brought it out again for the winter, and only one side is working now. The other side can be switched on, but switches off again almost immediately . I'm really disappointed, and feel for that cost, it should have lasted a lot longer! Save your money and shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Smary

customer_reviews.title: The dual setting is awesome. It is really fast in heating your bed
customer_reviews.text: This cover does not fit a Cal-king that well. You have to stretch it in the corners and it does not have as firm as a fit as I expected for this cover. That is a disadvantage along with the wires being on the corner of the electric mattress pad. The dual setting is awesome. It is really fast in heating your bed. So, I do over look the 2 disadvantages that this cover has because I love it so much! As a consumer. They need to make sure it is a firm fit and the wires are underneath the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Pad can malfunction, gets extremely hot, product is not supported by Serta.
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about 2 months, on low setting's recently (only once really since we had to unplug it) in the upper middle of the pad it got hot enough to wake my wife in the middle of the night, it was hot enough that you really couldn't touch it. I called Serta and it turns out that they do not manufacture this item and they transferred me to another company called "Perfect Fit" and I haven't been able to get a hold of them yet for any kind of warranty support, it rings and goes to voicemail.

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful mattress pad and works like a dream if the ...

I'm going to send the 2nd one back and doubt I'll order another.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price

The idea is not to use it as a heating pad, although it does get pretty toasty, but if you preheat a few minutes before getting into bed..you'll forego that initial cold shock. I bought a twin size for my half of our king sized bed and I have it above the sheet. In the future if I have to replace it, I will buy a king size and put it on properly under the sheet. Since the king has two controls, my husband will leave his side off.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!! Very plush under fitted sheet and works very well. I use this every night when it is "cold" and often use it on a lower setting throughout the spring and summer because I cannot sleep if I am "cold". I have other, less expensive, units on the guest room beds. They work and do the job. But this one is super plush and worth every penny!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have only been using this heated mattress cover for one week. However, it has already surpassed our last one. The type of heat is a "soft heat," which means it is not hot to the touch by just reaching under the covers. You have to actually get into the bed and under the covers to determine the level of heat you need. This is good information because it is deceiving to just put the heater on HIGH and reach under the covers. Doing so may lead someone to think the cover is not working properly.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

The only thing I have noticed is if the sheets are pulled back then it does not work (I guess the warmth is just lost to the air), but as long as the bedding is pulled up you will get into a toasty bed. I usually set it on about 6-7 and that is enough to warm even my husband's feet, then we are usually able to turn it off for the night.

Problem: The light comes on, and after 5 seconds shuts off. No heat on that side. And believe me, when it is -10 degrees outside it is more than annoying. How to I contact the vendor?????
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have heated mattress pads on all my beds and have been using them for a few years now. I needed a new one for my bed since I carelessly put it in the dryer. I ordered this one because the price was right despite the negative reviews. It came yesterday and I was immediately impressed with its softness. I could not feel the wires while sleeping and it fits just right. It heats up nicely and you can feel the heat with your hand unlike the instructions. I am very pleased with this purchase and love the 2 independent controls on each side instead of a long cord under the bed. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: West. mom

customer_reviews.title: You can't feel the wires! Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I received my heated mattress pad rather quickly. It is very soft, & comfortable, as the wires are so small that you can't feel them. And that was an important part for my decision to buy this. As I have rheumatoid arthritis and fibromyalgia, the brands with the larger wires were very uncomfortable for me. I have my heat set on 8. It is just nicely warm. Easy to sleep at that temp without sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: So soft! Temperature control is great - lots of options. I have never had to use it any higher than 3. Warmth is evenly distributed. Turn it on 20 minutes before you go to bed (leaving your covers in place). Guaranteed cozy sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Bogtrotter

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this heated mattress pad. It is so incredibly soft and heats up quick (no need to preheat before bed). Even in the middle of winter I think the highest I ever put the temperature was 4, and that's plenty warm. Usually I keep it at Lo or on No. 1 and I'm comfortable. It's even nicer having dual control for a king size bed, so I keep one side on and one side off... If I get cold I go to the heated side, and if I get warm I roll over to the side that's off. I'd recommend this one, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Del Brinlow

customer_reviews.title: ... the same electric mattress cover for years that I loved. This one is much better
customer_reviews.text: I had had the same electric mattress cover for years that I loved. This one is much better! It's easy to set up. The Sherpa design adds extra softness and comfort to my mattress. I am cold natured and even on the Lo setting is perfect for me all night. I set it on high about 20 minutes before slipping into bed. My bed is toasty warm. The controls are easy to use and the digital display makes it easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Mayfair

customer_reviews.title: Warm and snuggly
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the old electric mattress pad I had that bit the dust, this one is much more comfy. It has a fleece-like texture on the surface, so it's comfortably soft, and you can't feel wires at all. I don't think I read the reviews carefully enough when I was considering buying this pad, however, because I didn't realize it doesn't heat up the bed; it's only warm where you're lying on it. That was disappointing, as I could turn my old pad on before I went to bed and have the whole bed toasty before I got in. But that's my own fault. I'm still glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: readnwrite

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this heated mattress pad for just over one week and truly love it! It warms the bed very gently and really helps us feel relaxed and comfy. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is the connecting wires for the controls are too short to plug the connections in at the foot of the bed as illustrated in the instructions. The instructions do show the alternative of putting the control connection plugs at the head of the bed, which is what we did and it works just fine. Not sure why the illustrations in the instructions show an option that isn't possible with the short length of the wires.

I will not buy another one.

As far as I can see this only has technology that shuts off AFTER 10 HOURS OF USE. NOT HELPFUL. As a regular (not as advertised) heating pad, it is probably fine. Thus, 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: katrina b.

product_meta.title: Serta | Luxurious Sherpa Heated Electric Mattress Pad with Safe & Warm Low-Voltage Technology (King)
product_meta.description:
Size:King| Style:Mattress PadSerta Sherpa Top Low-Voltage Electric Heated Mattress Pad- stay comfy with the all over penetrating warmth of this low-voltage mattress pad. The incredibly luxurious 100-percent polyester 180gsm Plush Sherpa Fabric not only warms your bed, but also rejuvenates it. Constructed within the pad is the patented Safe and Warm low-voltage technology. This low-voltage mattress pad includes a small power supply box that changes 120 volt AC home current into non-hazardous low voltage DC current (very similar to a battery) to provide warmth, protection and safety even if the pad becomes wet. Unlike other warming pads with their thick bulky wires, the wires in the Serta pads are so small and thin; they are virtually unnoticeable. During construction we place the thin wires 3-Inch apart and evenly distribute them from head to toe to give even heat and eliminate annoying hot or cold spots. The king size pad is divided in two separate zones and comes standard with two easy to read, easy to turn, non-slip computerized controllers to individually adjust the temperature of each side of the bed. A giant backlit display with auto dimming feature provides more convenience for night time adjustments without having to turn on the lights. For cozy sheets before bed time, it has an automatic pre-heat and hold feature. You simply turn it on and the pad will warm up on HI until it reaches the temperature that you pre set your dial on and then adjusts itself to hold it there. For your safety, convenience and power conservation it has an automatic shut off feature that will shut the pad off after 10 hours just in case you forget. It also comes standard with built in over-temperature protection for that extra bit of safety and peace of mind. A fitted skirt keeps it all in place to eliminate shifting or bunching and gives better sheet fit. Conveniently machine washable and dryable. Not recommended for use with an electric adjustable bed, water bed or blowup air beds (Sleep Number beds are OK).

This warming product has been designed to provide you a gentle relaxing heat. It will NOT feel warm to the touch of your hand, even on the highest (HI) setting.
You must actually use it to experience the cozy warmth that it will generate.
If the control lamp is lit, it is working. We suggest you start at the HI setting for the first use and then adjust down to your personal comfort level. To receive the most pleasure from your warming product, read your User Manual.
